text: Niccolò Ghedini (22 December 1959 – 17 August 2022) was an Italian lawyer and politician. He was known as the lawyer of the former prime minister Silvio Berlusconi.(1 March 2011). Niccolò Ghedini, difensore di Silvio Berlusconi in tribunale , politica (in Italian) Ghedini was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 2001 to 2013. He also was a Senator from 2006 until his death. Ghedini was born in Padua, Italy. Ghedini died on 17 August 2022 at a hospital in Milan, Italy from leukemia at the age of 62.E’ morto l’avvocato padovano Niccolò Ghedini, uno dei fedelissimi di Berlusconi ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:Italian lawyers Category:Politicians from Veneto
